name: Valhalla: A Valkyrie's journey
description:
Valhalla: A Valkyrie's journey is a videogame based on norse mythology, where you take control of a Valkyrie accused of killing Baldr, and you have to clean your name on an epic adventure.

It's more of a demo than anything, but we worked hard, enjoy ;D

Controls: 

They're all in the settings section of the game

Credits: Bartomeu Fontcuberta, Vladislav Skorokhodov, Marc Riera, Carlos Franco
